description: This file is the main entry point for a Flutter application, setting up the app widget, theme, and home page structure.

classes.name: MyApp
classes.description: The root widget of the Flutter application, which sets the theme and home page.

classes.name: MyHomePage
classes.description: A StatefulWidget that represents the main screen with a title and state.

classes.name: _MyHomePageState
classes.description: The state class for MyHomePage, building the scaffold with app bar and body content.

methods.name: main
methods.description: The entry point of the application, runs the MyApp widget.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree for MyApp and MyHomePage classes.
